text.looting: The use of WEHAGO mobile service is restricted on rooted terminals. Exit the app for security.
text.duplicate_logout: Logging out, as another device has logged into your WEHAGO account.
text.duplicate_login: You are using wehago on your other device. Would you like to close the existing connection and connect a new one?
text.timeover: Request time has been exceeded. Try again.
text.problem_ocurred: There was a problem processing the requested operation. please try again.
text.other_info_mobile: Accessed with information different from the existing login information. Would you like to log in with the changed information?
text.other_info_web:
Does not match existing login information. 
 Do you want to continue? 
 After the video conference is over, 
 the existing login information will be deleted.
text.usage_restriction: WEHAGO service use is limited. Contact the Customer Center if you have any inquiries on limited service use.
text.init_company: Initial company settings in progress. You can use the service after completing configuration in WEHAGO web.
text.unpaid: No deposit has been made to the virtual account. You can use WEHAGO services after your deposit is confirmed.
text.no_app_store: Unable to find the app in store.
text.no_exist_joincode: The participation code does not exist.
text.fail_share_file_size:
The file size that can be shared is exceeded.
Please select a file less than 20MB.
text.unsupported_doc: This file does not support document sharing.
text.방지문자틀림: You have entered an incorrect character to prevent automatic entry.
text.세션만료: Your session has expired. Please login again
text.5번틀림: Login has failed five times. You will be redirected to the page to enter automated input prevention characters.
text.사용제한메시지: Unable to process your login, as there is either no company information or the signup has not been completed.
text.접근권한: The microphone and camera access rights are required to use the service. Please allow access to the microphone and camera in the settings.
text.만들기실패: Video conference creation has failed. Please try again.
text.방만들기: Do you want to create a video conference?
text.종료문구:
Do you want to quit [@mode@]?
(If you quit, [@mode@] will not be visible to all participants and you will be returned to the video conferencing screen.)
text.화상종료문구: Do you want to end the video conference?
text.생성실패: Video conference creation has failed. Please try again.
text.접근금지: Waiting to accept the participation request.

message.power_update:
Meet the new WEHAGO Meet.

 New features will be available after the update.
message.update_text:
Meet the newer WEHAGO Meet.

New features will be available after the update.

Would you like to update now?

login.참여코드내용: Enter the shared participation code and participate immediately.
login.횟수초과: Maximum number of log-in attempts using ID has been exceeded
login.피해방지: To prevent damages caused by the unauthorized use of personal information
login.5회제한: You can attempt to log in a maximum of 5 times.
login.방지문자뜸: For information protection, enter the automated input prevention characters in order

splash.첫화면:
Efficient video conferencing 
without time and place constraints
splash.1번내용: Efficient video conferencing without time and place constraints
splash.2번내용: Create a new meeting or join the ongoing WE Talk video conference right away
splash.3번내용: Connected organization chart Supports video/voice calls from employees to customers
splash.4번내용:
Share PC screens or documents in real time
Provide conversation function during video conference
splash.5번내용:
Image quality automatically adjusted 
according to the network speed

main.없음: There is no video conference in progress.
main.we텍스트: Start video conferencing and calling on the WEHAGO app.
main.sp텍스트: You can participate in a video conference after creating a video conference room.
main.대화시작: Press the + button to start a conversation

create_room.검색결과없음텍스트: Try creating a messenger in WEHAGO.

option.약관법률: Terms and Conditions and other legal information
option.kisa: KISA Personal Information & Information Security Management System (ISMS-P) certified

drawer.스토어없음: Unable to find the app in store.

meet.돌아가:
Please return to the app
to load the document.

chatting.대화없음:
There is no previous conversation. 
 Start the conversation.

toast.마이크꺼진다: If you don't return to the app, the microphone will turn off after a while.

master.마이크비활성: The microphone has been disabled by the master.
master.마이크활성: The master has handled mic activation
master.발언권제어시작: The master begins to control the voice of all participants.
master.발언권제어끝: The participant's right to speak control function has ended.
master.요청거부: Request to speak has been denied.

delete.타이틀: The video conference room does not exist.
delete.고객센터:
Video conference room has been deleted, or cannot currently be entered. 
 If the problem persists, report it to the Customer Center.
delete.30분전부터: You can connect to a video conference room starting 30 minutes before the conference is scheduled to start.
delete.참여불가: You cannot participate in the conference if you are not designated as a participant.
delete.다른경우: Unable to enter conference if start time has been changed or schedule has been deleted.

full.타이틀: The maximum number of users allowed to connect has been exceeded
full.50명제한: For successful service access, up to 50 users can connect to the service.
full.고객센터: If the problem persists, please report it to the Customer Center.

reservation.타이틀:
You can join the meeting up to 30 minutes prior to its commencement. 
 Only the function to check the details of reservation is provided (Details can be changed by logging in with your PC only.).

wating.타이틀: Video conference has not been started.
wating.시작예정:
Meeting is scheduled to start. 
 If you cannot enter the video conference, close the app and start it again.
wating.변경및삭제: if video conference schedule is changed or video conference room is deleted.
wating.마스터문의: Check the master for details on schedule change and cancellation.
wating.고객센터: please report it to the Customer Center.

setting.title: Please proceed with the basic settings before the video chat.
setting.detail: If you do not want to, you can enter immediately after clicking the video chat participation button.
setting.output: Display and sound audio output settings
setting.name: Name setting
setting.setname: Please set a name to use in the chat room.
setting.nameDefault: If not entered, the default is applied. (Maximum 20 characters can be set)

title.팩미구매: Company that has not purchased video conference pack
title.미구매: Company that has not purchased video conference pack

selectcompany.message:
This company has not purchased the video conference service. 
 Please purchase the service.
